metadata.title: CVE-2024-0861 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.4 before 16.7.6, all versions starting from 16.8 before 16.8.3, allversions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.1. Users with the `Guest` role canchange `Custom dashboard projects` settings contrary to permissions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
